name: So it’s time to play the game, “can I run Windows with USB passthrough in a VM on an M1 MacBook Pro?” Stay tuned for the very boring saga!

summary: @cleverdevil Not boring to me! I ordered an AWOL after seeing your raves and we have been very happy with ours as well. Just got it installed last month. Will be curious about any adventures you have with the upgrade.

content.html: @cleverdevil Not boring to me! I ordered an AWOL after seeing your raves and we have been very happy with ours as well. Just got it installed last month. Will be curious about any adventures you have with the upgrade.
content.value: @cleverdevil Not boring to me! I ordered an AWOL after seeing your raves and we have been very happy with ours as well. Just got it installed last month. Will be curious about any adventures you have with the upgrade.

summary:
@fgtech oh amazing! Its a really great projector, and we're loving it so far. I have gripes, of course (the focus interface is terrible, some issues with dynamic contrast, etc.), but its definitely been a great investment.
Once we get the firmware update done, I am going to be paying for a professional ISF calibration. I'll probably stick with my own calibration using Dirac Live for the sound.
